items.title: Amazon Skincare Brand Launch: $50K/Month in 6 Months
items.excerpt: How we helped a new skincare brand achieve $50K monthly revenue on Amazon with 4.8-star rating and 500+ reviews.
items.challenge: BeautyGlow Essentials wanted to enter the competitive Amazon skincare market with their natural product line. They had no previous Amazon experience, limited marketing budget, and needed to build brand credibility from scratch.
items.solution: We developed a comprehensive Amazon launch strategy including product listing optimization, photography, A+ content, PPC campaigns, and review generation. We focused on long-tail keywords and targeted niche audiences to minimize competition.
results: Ranked in top 10 for 15+ target keywords

testimonial.quote: MettGlobal transformed our Amazon dream into reality. Their expertise in product positioning and PPC management helped us achieve profitability faster than we ever imagined.
testimonial.author: Jennifer Martinez

items.title: Textile Sourcing & Export: 10,000 Units with Zero Defects
items.excerpt: Successfully sourced and exported 10,000 high-quality textile units from Pakistan to Europe with zero defect rate.
items.challenge: A European fashion retailer needed a reliable sourcing partner in Pakistan to produce 10,000 custom textile units with strict quality standards, tight deadlines, and budget constraints.
items.solution: We leveraged our network of verified Pakistani manufacturers, conducted rigorous quality inspections at every production stage, and managed end-to-end logistics including customs clearance and shipping.
results: 10,000 units produced and delivered on time
30% cost savings compared to previous supplier
Established ongoing partnership for future orders
Delivery completed 2 weeks ahead of schedule

testimonial.quote: Working with MettGlobal gave us peace of mind. Their attention to detail and commitment to quality ensured our entire shipment met our exact specifications.
testimonial.author: Thomas Anderson

items.title: eCommerce Website for Retail Store: $20K in First 3 Months
items.excerpt: Built a high-converting eCommerce website that generated $20K in online sales within the first 3 months of launch.
items.challenge: HomeStyle Furniture, a brick-and-mortar store, wanted to expand online but had no digital presence. They needed a modern, user-friendly eCommerce platform that could showcase their 200+ products effectively.
items.solution: We built a custom Next.js eCommerce website with Shopify integration, featuring advanced search, AR product visualization, secure checkout, and mobile-first design. We also implemented SEO optimization and Google Ads campaigns.

testimonial.quote: MettGlobal didn't just build us a websiteâ€”they built us a revenue-generating machine. The design is beautiful and the functionality is seamless.
testimonial.author: Rachel Thompson

items.title: Cybersecurity Audit & Compliance for Fintech Startup
items.excerpt: Conducted comprehensive security audit and implemented SOC 2 compliance framework for a fast-growing fintech startup.
items.challenge: PayFlow Solutions needed to achieve SOC 2 compliance to secure enterprise contracts. They had limited security infrastructure and needed to pass rigorous third-party audits.
items.solution: We performed a complete security assessment, identified 47 vulnerabilities, implemented multi-layered security controls, established incident response procedures, and prepared comprehensive documentation for SOC 2 certification.
results: Successfully achieved SOC 2 Type II certification
Remediated all critical and high-risk vulnerabilities

testimonial.quote: MettGlobal's cybersecurity expertise was instrumental in our growth. Their thorough approach gave us and our clients confidence in our security posture.
testimonial.author: Mark Stevens

items.title: AI Chatbot Reduces Customer Support Costs by 60%
items.excerpt: Implemented AI-powered chatbot that handles 70% of customer queries automatically, reducing support costs by 60%.
items.challenge: TechSupport Pro was overwhelmed with repetitive customer support tickets. Their team of 10 agents couldn't keep up with demand, leading to long response times and customer dissatisfaction.
items.solution: We developed and trained a custom AI chatbot using natural language processing to handle common queries, integrated it with their existing helpdesk system, and implemented seamless handoff to human agents for complex issues.
results: Average response time reduced from 4 hours to instant
Customer satisfaction score increased from 3.2 to 4.6
Support team scaled from 10 to 4 agents

testimonial.quote: The AI chatbot from MettGlobal has been a game-changer. We're handling more queries with fewer resources while improving customer satisfaction.
testimonial.author: Lisa Chen

items.title: B2B Lead Generation: 500+ Qualified Leads in 90 Days
items.excerpt: Generated 500+ qualified B2B leads for a SaaS company using multi-channel outreach and targeted campaigns.
items.challenge: CloudFlow Analytics struggled to generate qualified leads for their analytics platform. Their sales team was spending too much time on cold outreach with low conversion rates.
items.solution: We implemented a comprehensive lead generation strategy including LinkedIn outreach, content marketing, email campaigns, and targeted advertising. We focused on decision-makers in mid-sized tech companies.

testimonial.quote: MettGlobal's lead generation service has filled our pipeline with high-quality prospects. Our sales team is now focused on closing deals instead of finding leads.
testimonial.author: David Park

items.title: Supply Chain Optimization Saves $150K Annually
items.excerpt: Optimized supply chain operations resulting in $150K annual savings and 40% faster delivery times.
items.challenge: Global Distribution Co faced inefficiencies in their supply chain including inventory management issues, delayed shipments, and high operational costs across their international network.
items.solution: We conducted a comprehensive supply chain audit, implemented inventory management software, optimized shipping routes, negotiated better carrier rates, and established performance tracking dashboards.
results: Real-time visibility across entire supply chain

testimonial.quote: MettGlobal's supply chain expertise transformed our operations. We're now more efficient, cost-effective, and our customers are happier than ever.
testimonial.author: Robert Williams

items.title: Complete Brand Identity for Tech Startup
items.excerpt: Created comprehensive brand identity from scratch, helping a tech startup secure $1M in seed funding.
items.challenge: InnovateTech had a great product but no brand identity. They needed to establish credibility and differentiate themselves in a crowded market before approaching investors.
items.solution: We developed a complete brand strategy including naming, logo design, brand guidelines, messaging framework, website, and marketing materials. We focused on positioning them as industry innovators.
results: Complete brand identity delivered in 8 weeks
Secured $1M seed funding within 2 months of brand launch
Brand recognition score of 78% in target market

testimonial.quote: The brand identity MettGlobal created perfectly captures who we are. Investors immediately connected with our vision, which played a huge role in securing our funding.
testimonial.author: Emily Rodriguez
